question: I was first diagnosed with reactive hypoglycemia.  Now the doctor is testing my A1C to see if I have diabetes.  My mom has Type 2 Diabetes and my dad has Type 1.It seems like no matter what I eat I get hot and sweaty and my pulse speeds up.  My mom loaned my one of her old glucose monitors and my blood sugar level was 314 the other night.  I'm so sick and tired of feeling sick and tired.I think I saw the word "Lytes" on the lab draw sheet and I know for sure that one of the tests is A1C.  Any idea how long it will take to get the results back?  I want to know what's going on!  lolThanks.
title: How long does it take to get blood results back?
